name: Space Race! (ripleyj2)
description:
Space Race is a 2D shooter game in which your evade stationary and chasing aliens. Beat all of them to win. Added elements include the following:

  1. A more visually appealing main menu screen
  2. An increased amount of aliens as you move through levels
  3. A special screen that is displayed when you beat all the levels

Credits:

Created by Joey Ripley
